name: Bidao Smart Chain
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Bidao Smart Chain is a new L1 blockchain. BiSC uses the Proof of Stake consensus algorithm like Ethereum. BiSC is open and permissionless, so that everyone can deploy smart contracts. The goal of BiSC is to be cheaper and faster than Ethereum.
